response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth every penny of its $12,000 value to you. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. We trust you'll find this investment not just valuable but also a wise choice for your needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our premium product.", "product_price": 11500}
